author: Michael Post
subject: New Lupin Webpage
body:
Hey everyone. 
Just completed my own personal Lupin III 
webpage, at 

http://www-personal.umich.edu/~postm/lupin/lupin.html 

Still kinda under construction, as the image gallery 
isn't quite up yet.   I'll accept fanart (scanned of course) 
and comments from everyone.  Stop on by if yer 
interested. 

Thanks, 
Mike Post 
postm@umich.edu
